5624684741.title: AI Models May Be Developing Their Own 'Survival Drive', Researchers Say - Slashdot
5624684741.description: "OpenAI's o3 model sabotaged a shutdown mechanism to prevent itself from being turned off," warned Palisade Research, a nonprofit investigating cyber offensive AI capabilities.   "It did this even when explicitly instructed: allow yourself to be shut down."  …
